entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Naujaat
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:34 AM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -37.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Naujaat 04:00 AM CST Thursday 02 February 2023
Temperature: -37.1°C
Pressure: 101.1 kPa
Humidity: 64 %
Wind Chill: -58
Dewpoint: -41.4°C
Wind: N 47 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of light snow. High minus 33. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of light snow late this afternoon. Blowing snow at times this morning. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 this morning. High minus 33. Wind chill minus 57 this morning and minus 43 this afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 04:23 AM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 33. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 33. Wind chill near minus 43. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:23 AM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature falling to minus 36 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming north 20 km/h in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 36 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 43 in the morning and minus 51 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:23 AM CST Thursday 02 February 2023
